basics.name: Tyler Tolton
basics.summary: Implementer and leader of teams in charge of delivering distributed app systems that connect user value with business outcomes.  Veteran of distributed teams in organizations with global functionality and impact requiring uncompromising high availability and optimization.  At global scale, companies require finely tuned caching strategy and scalable, resilient, observeable architectures fabricated from interchangeable components (Kubernetes, lambda, serverless architecture or autoscaled ec2 components all fit the bill). The data volume also requires a deep understanding of decoupling and event architecture, and practical experience with message queues and event streaming platforms such as Confluent's Kafka or Confluent Cloud.  Cloud native architecture built from ec2 or managed services is always my first choice.  Fast learner of all languages with a particular lova affair for functional languages and high productivity, high performance tech stacks such as python/pandas/dask/sympy, clojure/ring/spectre, or Rust.  Certified and professionally versed Data Scientist, finding practical ways to operationalize business knowledge with machine learning and deep learning models, with my particular history schewed toward word embedding and NLP based feature prediction.  Has helped form agile teams and establish agile sprint ceremonies.  Looking for companies that understand the value of feature ownership and cultivated internal learning and growth.
basics.label: Software Engineer and Data Scientist

used AWS APPSync to synchronize blockchain activity with customer admin panel and reporting tool

Synchronized business data between Salesforce source of truth and DynamoDB operational store
Deployed and managed secure hosting of 11 custom web apps on AWS Cloudfront CDN backed by S3 static site hosting
Administrated marketing wordpress website hosting on Elastic Beanstalk featuring secure salesforce connection for lead capture
work.summary: Nth Round is an NEA backed startup that aims to provide a blockchain-powered secure marketplace for the resale of private equity among its clients' shareholders.

AWS S3 based SFTP platform for 39 clients, used for triggering automated reports from Looker

work.summary: The Saber2 dev team was an internal development task force charged with modernizing and replacing Bank of America's capital reporting platform, Saber

Designed a cloud simulation engine using jinja2 templating and XML responses in combination with a flask server.
Unit testing using Pycharm Integrated nosetests and coverage, using Mock when needed.

Develop table less, W3C compliant web sites using CSS, XHTML, Javascript, jQuery and Python.
